Ingredients: 0.25 lb chicken or turkey (ground or shredded)
Recipes.Recipe Steps: Preheat oven to 400°F. Poke a line in the center of squash with a fork, microwave for 3-4 minutes to soften. Slice squash in half, remove seeds and fibers, place in a baking dish, brush with olive oil, season with salt and pepper, and bake at 400°F for 30-40 minutes. In a frying pan, melt butter and sauté garlic, add meat to cook. Reduce heat, add cream, cream cheese, Parmesan, and ⅔ of the mozzarella, simmer until creamy, season with spices. Remove squash from oven, increase oven temperature to 450°F. Loosen squash flesh with a fork, press down, top with cream sauce and remaining mozzarella, bake for 5 minutes. Garnish with fresh parsley before serving.

Ingredients: 1.5oz lb Shredded chicken (can be pre-cooked shredded chicken, rotisserie chicken, or chicken breast)
Recipes.Recipe Steps: Combine the chicken with salt, pepper, Cajun seasoning, and onion powder. Add the seasoned chicken to the tortilla. Top with reduced fat Mexican cheese and Taco Bell mild sauce.

Ingredients: 1 pounch of light tuna in water
Recipes.Recipe Steps: Lather the mayo onto the bread. Add the tuna and cheese. Enjoy!
